name: Lifmunk

ability.name: Lifmunk Recoil
ability.description: When activated, leaps into the player's head and uses a submachine gun to follows up player attacks.

description: Intelligent as a five to sever-year-old human child. It makes a wonderful partner, but there have been more than a few cases where they've killed their master after learning to use weapons.

skills.name: Wind Cutter
skills.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Air Cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: Power Shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: Seed Machine Gun
skills.description: Fires a volley of hard seeds at enemies in front of it.

skills.name: Power Bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: Spine Vine
skills.description: Generates spiny thorns that chase an enemy along the ground, piercing them from below.

skills.name: Solar Blast
skills.description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
